attributes.action: Make all new homes are GREEN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make all new homes have conection to a wind turbime either on the house itself or per estate, plus solar panels and the ability to use rainwater for toilets. Also make wind turbines to a certain size be free from planning permission and sold & installed at cost price to ensure it is affordable to as many people as possible.
